SELECT `memo`.`MemoIdx`, `memo`.`Title`, `memo`.`Contents`
FROM `soodal`.`tb_memotemplate` AS `memo` WHERE 1=1 AND `memo`.`CompanyCode` = @CompanyCode
`memo`.`Title` Like Concat('%', @Title, '%')
`memo`.`Contents` Like Concat('%', @Contents, '%')

SELECT `memo`.`MemoIdx`, `memo`.`Title`, `memo`.`Contents`
FROM `soodal`.`tb_memotemplate` AS `memo` WHERE 1=1 AND `memo`.`MemoIdx` = @MemoIdx AND `memo`.`CompanyCode` = @CompanyCode LIMIT 1

INSERT INTO `soodal`.`tb_memotemplate` (`MemoIdx`, `Title`, `Contents`, `CompanyCode`, `DelYn`, `CreateId`, `CreateDt`) VALUES (@MemoIdx, @Title, @Contents, @CompanyCode, 'N', @CreateId, now() ) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE `MemoIdx` = IF(@MemoIdx = LAST_INSERT_ID(@MemoIdx), LAST_INSERT_ID(), @MemoIdx), `Contents` = @Contents, `CompanyCode` = @CompanyCode, `DelYn` = 'N', `UpdateId` = @UpdateId, `UpdateDt` = now(), `DeleteId` = null, `DeleteDt` = null; SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID();
